clinical_history: Limb swelling, rule out deep venous thrombosis.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 15.64 bpm.
Breast tissue shows well-defined lesion measuring 28.81 mm.
Liver appears smooth-walled with no focal lesions.
Major vessels show isoechoic waveform on Doppler.
Thyroid gland shows well-defined echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
